name: Montane
description: A mountainous region with dense forests and diverse flora.

name: Alpine-Tundra
description: A cold, treeless region found at high altitudes, with hardy vegetation.

name: Cloud-Forest
description: A tropical or subtropical forest with persistent cloud cover and lush vegetation.

name: Prairie
description: A temperate grassland with few trees and abundant grasses.

name: Steppe
description: A dry, grassy plain with sparse tree cover, typical in arid climates.

name: Tundra
description: A cold, treeless region with low-growing vegetation and permafrost.

name: Savanna
description: A tropical grassland with scattered trees and a seasonal rainfall pattern.

name: Desertic
description: A hot, arid region with minimal vegetation and extreme temperature fluctuations.

name: Meadow
description: A temperate region with open, grassy fields and a variety of wildflowers.

name: Taiga
description: A cold forested region, also known as boreal forest, with coniferous trees.

name: Woodland
description: A temperate zone with mixed trees and shrubs, providing a diverse habitat.

name: Jungle
description: A dense, tropical forest with a rich variety of plant and animal life.

name: Mangrove
description: A coastal ecosystem with salt-tolerant trees and intricate root systems.

name: Tugay
description: A riparian forest found in arid regions, often along rivers and streams.
